name: AI Content Provenance Kit (Word, Excel, PowerPoint Templates)
description: A complete documentation system for tracking, documenting, and verifying AI-generated content for governance and transparency. Includes 6 files (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Text) with 100+ pages of templates, tracking systems, and compliance tools for responsible AI content management.
short_description: Templates and tools for documenting, tracking, and verifying AI-generated content with full transparency and compliance.
capabilities: Document every AI-generated content piece with full transparency
Track prompts, models, parameters, and verification details
Maintain compliance with emerging AI transparency regulations
Create audit trails for legal and quality control
Generate professional certificates for client deliverables

does: Provides comprehensive templates for AI content documentation
Includes Excel tracking system with automated formulas
Offers PowerPoint certificate templates for verified content
Contains 35+ page quickstart guide with best practices
Supports SHA256 hash generation for content authenticity
Helps meet EU AI Act and US state AI disclosure requirements
does_not: Provide legal advice on AI compliance
Automatically generate hashes or track content

delivery.contents: 6 files: Word, Excel (2 versions), PowerPoint, Text, License Agreement, 100+ pages total

use_cases: Marketing blog posts generated with GPT-4
Social media graphics created with DALL-E or Midjourney
Product descriptions generated with AI assistants
Email campaigns drafted with AI tools
Code snippets generated with GitHub Copilot
Audio content created with AI voice synthesis
